quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
author: W.B. Yeats

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Saroyan

quote: The more relaxed you can get, the better you'll do
author: Isaac Mizrahi

quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The calm mind is the ultimate weapon against challenges and adversities.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
author: W.B. Yeats

quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: The sun is a daily reminder that we too can rise again from the darkness, that we too can shine our own light.
author: S. Ajna

quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
author: Epictetus
